channel.title: R on erg home
channel.description: Recent content in R on erg home

item.title: Products
item.description: As of Winter 2023, the primary eg “off-the-shelf” product is an engagement survey developed in partnership with Eagle I.O. The eg team is also working on an package to capture online survey responses. Engagement survey 💃 The engagement survey has norms representing most major U.S. metropolitan areas as well as four industrial groups. The feedback report includes automatically generated presentation slides. A tutorial on the use of these slides is available here.
